'''It's Yesterday Once More''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. The achievements are earned by activating tunes in the [[Serenitea Pot]] using the [[Euphonium Unbound]] furnishing series.

==Achievements==
{{Achievements by Category Table|It's Yesterday Once More}}
<!--
==Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* The achievement's name is likely a reference to the song "{{w|Yesterday Once More (song)|Yesterday Once More}}" by {{w|The Carpenters}}. The song itself is about listening to old songs that evoke nostalgia and bring back old feelings.
* The Indonesian name is likely a reference to the song "Sepanjang Masa Kenangan" by Tetty Kadi.
